version_description:
- Minor usability and user experience improvements.
- Minor bug fixes.
- If an update is required for compatibility, the user will now be directed to the App Store.
- Jobs that have expired now include a visible indication of when expiration occurred.
- When applying to a job, notes about the documents requested of the applicant may be displayed.
- When applying to a job, detailed instructions on how to apply may be displayed.
- If you attempt to load a job that has been removed or archived, a friendly notice will inform you of it’s removal.
- If you cannot find your school in the list of supported schools, an explanation of the Symplicity network of schools is now provided.

- When you apply to certain experiential learning jobs, your application will be immediately approved.
- Some experiential learning jobs no longer require a resume included with your application.
- More colleges and universities have joined our custom icon initiative, which allows you to change the app icon to reflect the institution's brand.

To help you discover, plan and make the most of career fairs, we have added Career Fairs to the app. Here are a few things that you can do with Career Fairs:
- View upcoming and past career fairs, organized by relevance.
- Research employers and indicate
who you plan to meet.
- View all jobs posted by attending employers, organized by relevance.
- Favorite and Apply to jobs posted to the career fair.
- On some fairs, you can make your resume/CV available to employers ahead of time.


This release also includes minor fixes and usability improvements that ensure the best possible experience.
Thank you for using Symplicity Jobs and Careers! This update includes minor updates for reliability and user experience.
Thank you for using Symplicity Jobs and Careers! This update includes minor updates for reliability and user experience.
Thank you for using Symplicity Jobs and Careers! This update includes minor updates for reliability and user experience.
Thank you for using Symplicity Jobs and Careers! This update includes minor updates for reliability and user experience.

In this update, we’ve made it easy to use your time wisely at busy Career Fairs with interactive booth maps:

- Career Fair events may include a booth map, allowing you to locate employer booths at the fair.
- See the location of all the employers you are interested in the moment you open the booth map.
- Pan, zoom, and tap the map to see what other employers are nearby.
- Mark the employers you are interested in without leaving the map
- Quickly search for employer locations across all of the days, locations and rooms of a fair.
- Access the booth map from the Career Fair overview, the Employers list, and the Employer information screen.

This release also includes minor fixes and usability improvements that ensure the best possible experience.
Thank you for using Symplicity Jobs and Careers! This update adds custom app branding for participating institutions and minor language fixes.
Thank you for using Symplicity Jobs and Careers! This update includes minor updates for reliability and user experience.

-Minor bug fixes
-Minor usability and user experience improvements

Thank you for using Symplicity Jobs and Careers! With this update, you’ll find an all new Discover screen with job recommendations organized into categories that are based on your profile and usage of the app. The more you use the app, the better the recommendations get!

In this update, you’ll be able to:

Create Job Alerts for your searches
See your pending documents when applying to a job
Find jobs near a location with fewer taps
Find your school with greater ease
Additionally, this update delivers bug fixes and adds custom app branding for participating institutions.

Thank you for using Symplicity Jobs and Careers! This update adds deep-linking, so that when you tap on a link to a job from an email or other notification, you'll be taken to that destination in the app rather than the web browser. Also included are improvements to functionality, user experience, and custom app branding for participating institutions.

Thank you for using Symplicity Jobs and Careers! In this release:

- You can hide dismissed jobs from your search results with a new filter.
- If you use single-sign-on, but don't have a Career Center account, you'll be informed and given steps to take.
- First-time users will see UI and usability improvements.
- Bug fixes and custom branding for participating institutions.

Thank you for using Symplicity Jobs and Careers! In this update, we've dramatically improved uploading, sharing, and collaborative approval of documents you need for job applications. We have also made several improvements for performance, stability and user experience.

Thank you for using Symplicity Jobs and Careers! In this release, you can access all-new Virtual Career Fairs. In the virtual fair, you will be able to chat with employers using video meeting software you already know and love, like Zoom, Teams and more.
